title: Sketchbook Folio, "Wave Crashing on Single Rock", 1890–1900
medium: Pen and black ink on off-white wove paper
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: View of ocean done in small, delicate cross-hatching. In center, large wave breaks over single rock. On horizon at left (possible) ships in the distance. Miscellaneous pen strokes in margin to right of image.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Wave Crashing on Single Rock", 1890–1900.
1890–1900. Pen and black ink on off-white wove paper. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-89-75.
